𒀫 būru < borjú (calf 𐎓𐎂𐎍 ʿglᵇ )

𒀫 būru πουρο puer בְּרָא bərā پوره pure born "son, descendant" <> calf; young, youngster, chick 𓅱 > pollo

𒀫 būru Bursche পুত্ৰ putro 𓅱 chick, son پسر pesa person

𒁀𒉌𒂊 ba-né-e bien "noble-born" (𒌉𒎌)

𒆕 #bani "ben, bearer" born bau build, create, creator, engender

𒀤 hibira "son" Hebrew ha.born #māru 𓄟
